title: PBE Sign Up not working?
body: Hey just wanted to mention, I was granted PBE access yesterday (11/9) and clicked to link to sign up but it would not work. I tried to access the PBE create and account page but kept getting the same 500 error. Is this a problem with my computer, or with the servers? Thanks!

replies.body: I was allowed pbe access 11/7 (yesterday) and it is giving me the Blitzcrank: 500 (hextechnically wrong) error also when I try to go to the link. I have tried Firefox and Chrome along with 3 browsers on my phone and they all do the same. Is it working for other people, or is the same problem happening?

> [{quoted}](name=DragonFire4444,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4Nclz3AE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-08T22:25:32.288+0000)
>
> I was allowed pbe access 11/7 (yesterday) and it is giving me the Blitzcrank: 500 (hextechnically wrong) error also when I try to go to the link. I have tried Firefox and Chrome along with 3 browsers on my phone and they all do the same. Is it working for other people, or is the same problem happening?

Same situation for me, nothing seems to be working.

I've been seeing a few reports about this, and I'm not sure what's causing this but it may be due to some connection or routing problem.  I'd recommend trying another browser, device, or even [VPN ](https://www.hotspotshield.com/)to troubleshoot. Hope that helps!
I've tried this so many times on different browsers/devices. Nothing works.
I've tried three different devices, with chrome, firefox, internet, and safari and neither the email link or the link on the riot website seem to be working for me. What else can I do? thanks.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/232314208--Nov-8-PBE-Account-Creation-For-Help-Click-Here-


I had to copy the create an account link directly from this page and it worked
I am slightly confused on what I do can you explain?{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
It worked! Apparently the email link was just messed up for some reason. Thank you very much!
I'm having the same issue. Tried suggestions.
Same issue, not sure whats wrong, tried to use a different link but that's not working.
